Name: UserIdentity
SummaryComment: The definition of the user identity under which the task is run. On CloudServiceConfiguration pools, this user is logged in with the INTERACTIVE flag. On Windows VirtualMachineConfiguration pools, this user is logged in with the BATCH flag.

Key.Name: UserName
Key.SummaryComment: The name of the user identity under which the task is run.
Key.RemarksComment: The <see cref="UserName"/> and <see cref="AutoUser"/> properties are mutually exclusive; you must specify one but not both.

Key.Name: AutoUser
Key.SummaryComment: The auto user under which the task is run.
Key.RemarksComment: The <see cref="UserName"/> and <see cref="AutoUser"/> properties are mutually exclusive; you must specify one but not both.
